L2_gloss: The first letter of the Ingush alphabet, written in the Cyrillic script.
night, йийкха бийса ― jīqa bīsa ― clear (cloudless)
absorbent cotton, cotton wool, wadding, batting, cotton
rag (piece of cloth)[1], floorcloth[2], cork[3], wad

Ingush people
гӀалгӀай мотт ― ġalġaj mott ― Ingush language
24-hour day, nychthemeron, Ди-бийса ткъаь диъ сахьат
how much, how many, Масса сахьат даьннад? ― Massa saḥat
language, tongue, мотт тохка Iилма ― mott toχka Iilma

(possessive) my
Са цӀи Саид я. ― Sa c̣i Said ja. ― My name is Said.
Хил дехьа бах са гаргара нах. ― Χil deḥa baχ sa gargara naχ. ― My relatives live on the other side of the river.
Са наьнал дикагӀа саг вац. ― Sa nänal dikaġa sag wac. ― There's nobody better than my mother.
